name: sap.watt.uitools.plugin.fiorireferenceapps.service.referenceTemplateValidator
description: Interface of the reference application templates validator

validate.description: Validates a given template for selection according to given model, or throws an error with the appropriate message if validation fails

params.name: oTemplate
params.description: The object of the reference app template to validate

returns.description: returns true if the template is valid for selection according to given model, or throws an error with the appropriate message if validation fails
